content.text:
# 43rd César Awards__disambig_1

| best_film        = BPM (Beats per Minute)
| best_actor       = Swann Arlaud
| best_actor_film  = Bloody Milk
| best_actress     = Jeanne Balibar
| best_actress_film = Barbara
| most_wins        = BPM (Beats per Minute) (6)
| most_nominations = BPM (Beats per Minute) (13)See You Up There (13)
| network          = Canal+
| last             = 42nd
| next             = 44th
}}
The 43rd César Awards ceremony, presented by the Académie des Arts et Techniques du Cinéma, took place on 2 March 2018, at the Salle Pleyel in Paris to honour the best French films of 2017.
